name: This dog is a cat!
description:
This is a party video game which visualize a real situation. 

The story happens in the meeting room where your boss is absolute. Everyone knows that what your leader says is certainly incorrect. There are two choices, follow and get praise or deny and score goes negative.

However, there is no truly right or wrong answer. You just have to figure it out by yourself.

the mindset of the game is " you have the right to think or act freely, but in some situation you have to follow the other's lead because you're inferior, you can't properly express your comments or thoughts in front of your superior even though his statement is very nonsense, it's true in human society also" 

the downloadable file will be our latest prototype, it can be played with PS4 controller only, if use xbox controller it will be malfunction

 

Team members (Group: Ma Ban Chan Chue Meaw)

Chanya Sriuranpong  - UI, SFX, BGM

Thanyamon Silamom -  UI, SFX, BGM 

Prachaya Sriboonrueng - 3D modeling, animation

Pawisa Peetavibonsatien - 3D modeling. stage

Panupong Nuansri - Coding
